business_intent: Provide a flexible, configurable loss component for sequence‑to‑sequence models (e.g., speech recognition) that rely on lattice scores, allowing users to switch between maximum‑likelihood and MAP objectives and to choose among CTC, RNNT, and MMI losses while managing memory usage.
